results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እርሱም በሩቁ ወሬ ላይ ሰሳች (ንፉግ) አይደለም፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እርሱ የዓለማት መገሠጫ እንጅ ሌላ አይደለም፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ከናንተ ቀጥተኛ መኾንን ለሻ ሰው (መገሰጫ ነው)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
